examples: The room was littered with discarded newspapers.
La habitación estaba llena de periódicos desechados.
He had discarded his jacket because of the heat.
Se había quitado la chaqueta a causa del calor.
She could now discard all thought of promotion.
Ahora podía descartar todo pensamiento de ascenso.
10 per cent of the data was discarded as unreliable.
El 10 por ciento de los datos se descartó por no ser confiable.
